name: Geodesic Shield Matrix
desc: Converts the shield to a geodesic emitter. Reduces incoming damage by a flat amount, but some damage bleeds through to armor.

name: Nanolaminate Plating
desc: Increases armor by %s/%s/%s/%s, minimum armor rating by %s, and maximum armor damage reduction by %s. Increases the repair rate from remote armor patches by %s.

name: Range Synchronizer
desc: Averages the base range of all equipped non-missile, non-PD modular weapons. Cannot increase any individual weapon's range by more than %s, and does not account for other modifiers to weapon base range.
sModDesc: Increases the maximum range bonus to %s.

name: Cryocooled Armor Lattice
desc: Increases armor rating by %s/%s/%s/%s, reduces damage taken from beams by %s, and reduces maneuverability by %s. Allows unshielded ships to receive remote armor patches, but reduces their repair rate by %s.
short: Allows remote patches on shieldless ships.

name: Coherency Amplifier
desc: Causes fragmentation damage from projectile energy weapons to gain extra EMP damage equal to %s of the base projectile damage. Additionally, Quark-Gluon PD weapons deal an extra %s damage to ships and fighters.
sModDesc: Increases projectile speed by %s for all weapons.

name: Networked Targeting Array
desc:
Coordinates targeting between ship-mounted weapons and strikecraft, increasing ship and fighter weapon range but reducing fighter control range by %s.

Ship-mounted weapons have their base range increased by up to %s, up to a maximum of %s total base range. Fighter weapons have their range increased by up to %s. These bonuses are proportional to the amount of ordnance points spent on weapons, reaching the full bonus at %s OP.

name: Cryocoolant Projector
desc: Installs a Cryocoolant Projector subsystem. Maintaining the system is a complex and expensive affair, increasing deployment and monthly supply cost by %s/%s/%s/%s.
sModDesc: Nullifies the deployment and maintenance cost increase.

name: Remote Armor Patcher
desc: Installs the Remote Armor Patch subsystem. Maintaining the system is a complex and expensive affair, increasing deployment and monthly supply cost by %s/%s/%s/%s.
sModDesc: Nullifies the deployment and maintenance cost increase.

name: Active Flare Projector
desc: Installs an active flare launcher in the ship's nozzle system. Maintaining the system is a complex and expensive affair, increasing deployment and monthly supply cost by %s/%s/%s/%s.
sModDesc: Nullifies the deployment and maintenance cost increase.

name: Augmented Range Synchronizer
desc: Averages the base range of all equipped non-missile, non-PD modular weapons. Cannot increase any individual weapon's range by more than %s, and does not account for other modifiers to weapon base range.

name: Expanded Squadrons
desc: Advanced avionics and nanoforges can produce and command additional strikecraft, %s wing size (up to a maximum of 6 fighters in a wing) and reducing refit times by %s. These extra strikecraft have a %s effect on the fighter replacement rate if destroyed. Requires an additional %s crew per fighter bay.

name: Clustered Phase Coils
desc:
Multiple small, tightly-packed phase coils produce an altered phase profile.

Reduces the timeflow bonus from phase to %s. In exchange, phase cloak cooldown and activation cost is reduced by %s, and the maximum speed penalty from phase coil stress is reduced to %s.

name: Limited Magazines
desc: A lack of large internal volumes %s. Each missile weapon requires %s/%s/%s units of internal space to mount without penalty. Mounting more than %s/%s/%s/%s units of missile weapons will reduce missile ammo capacity by %s (multiplicative) for each unit above the cap.

name: Enhanced Nozzles
desc: Upgraded nozzle projection systems and larger internal volumes improve cycle times for nozzle subsystems. Reduces nozzle subsystem cooldown by %s.

name: Overloaded Nozzles
desc: The scarcity of spare internal volume for nozzle systems reduces efficiency if they are installed, increasing their cooldown time by %s.

name: Fleet Servicing Gantry
desc: A large collection of replenishment drones and autofactories permits more efficient recovery while underway. Improves the fleet's repair rate and CR recovery rate by %s. Multiple gantries stack with diminishing returns.

name: Collective Armor Engineering
desc:
Collective engineers have extensive experience with starship armor, allowing them to eke out a bit more performance and repair damaged sections faster. Armor rating for the damage reduction calculation is increased by %s, and %s of armor and hull damage is repaired after combat ends for no cost.

"He was more than a hero. He was a union man."

name: Variable Warheads
desc: Taipan VLS systems incorporate an advanced internal autoforge, allowing a variety of warheads to be produced with a simple reconfiguration. Switching missile payloads can be done %s for changing hullmods.
short: Variable missile ammo selection. You shouldn't see this in-game.

name: Nanoacid Warheads
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce %s warheads for the ship's Taipan VLS.

Remove this hullmod to switch to %s warheads. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.

name: Kinetic Warheads
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce %s warheads for the ship's Taipan VLS.

Remove this hullmod to switch to %s warheads. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.

name: Tachyon Warheads
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce %s warheads for the ship's Taipan VLS.

Remove this hullmod to switch to %s warheads. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.

name: Variable Warheads
desc: Ammo swap control hullmod for Thunderstorm SLRM. You shouldn't see this in-game.

name: Disruptor Payload
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce a %s payload for the ship's Thunderstorm SLRM launcher.

Remove this hullmod to switch to a %s payload. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.

name: Graviton Payload
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce a %s payload for the ship's Thunderstorm SLRM launcher.

Remove this hullmod to switch to a %s payload. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.
short: EMP (now kinetic, too much work to change the IDs) mines

name: Harmonic Payload
desc:
Sets the integrated missile autoforge to produce a %s payload for the ship's Thunderstorm SLRM launcher.

Remove this hullmod to switch to a %s payload. Changing this hullmod in space has %s.

name: Refit: Hauler
desc: Replaces the hangar modules with cargo pods, increasing cargo capacity by %s. Without the need to support fighters, deployment and maintenance costs are decreased by %s, and crew requirements are decreased by %s.

name: Refit: Tanker
desc: Replaces the hangar modules with fuel tanks, increasing fuel capacity by %s. Without the need to support fighters, deployment and maintenance costs are decreased by %s, and crew requirements are decreased by %s.

name: Civilian Refit
desc: Hidden hullmod that makes refit carriers be treated as civilian ships.

name: Gravitic Phase Cluster
desc: Designed to run off of the breach core's gravitic flux output, these exotic phase coils produce rapid transitions into p-space.

name: Cryonic Nanolattice
desc: An ultra-hard nanoscale lattice cooled to near absolute zero. Converts nearly all incoming damage to heat and then dissipates it through ablation.

name: Breach Core
desc: A dozen capital-grade shield emitters wrapped around a barely-contained hyperspace breach, this exotic reactor provides fantastic amounts of power and enables manipulation of entropy.

name: Bricker
desc: Come on, this isn't a power fantasy mod. This one isn't for players. Of course, if you're reading this, you can probably figure out how to remove it.

name: Ablative Spaced Armor
desc:
Increases armor rating, weapon health, and engine health by %s. Decreases armor effectiveness by %s. 

Incoming damage that exceeds %s per hit or %s beam damage per second (after damage type bonuses) has the amount above %s reduced by %s. Has no effect if armor is stripped below %s of its full value.
sModDesc: Increases the armor bonus to %s, and increases the effectiveness penalty to %s.

name: Integrated Autoforge
desc: Missile weapons reload ammo equal to %s of their capacity per minute. Missiles that already reload ammo will have their reload speed increased by this amount. Missiles that do not naturally reload will always reload one full burst at a time.

name: Relic Targeting Array
desc: Increases the base range of all weapons by %s, and the base range of energy weapons by an additional %s. Energy weapons generate %s less flux.

name: Adaptive Armor Protocol
desc: Armor plating adapts to incoming damage, taking up to %s less armor damage based on how much damage it took recently. The damage reduction decays over time, and has no effect on hull damage resistance.
